Source.Name: OpenMx
Source.Summary: OpenMx is free and open source software for use with R that allows estimation of a wide variety of advanced multivariate statistical models.
Source.Description: OpenMx is free and open source software for use with R that allows estimation of a wide variety of advanced multivariate statistical models. OpenMx consists of a library of functions and optimizers that allow you to quickly and flexibly define an SEM model and estimate parameters given observed data.
